originalText.text:
I got a haircut with a straight perm by NicoleðŸ’› Ive had long hair for years and was scared to cut it also my hair very curly and frizzy for asian hair but I knew I could trust her and she exceeded my expectations. She is patient and pays attention to detail and I am happy with the outcome.

The salon and staffs are always welcoming. You can tell how much they enjoy what they do and that just makes it so enjoyable for me to just be there.

I highly recommend Nicole and Harueh !

originalText.text:
I had a digital perm done by Reina and she did an amazing job!

She's super sweet and she makes you feel like you're right at home with her. I showed her a picture of what I wanted, but she knew that because I had more layers to my hair, she suggested that we did something a little different so it would fit MY current hair type and length.

I really appreciated that because a lot of hair stylists that I've gone to in the past won't even bother to give advice like that, so I always grew up thinking that I could look EXACTLY like any picture I would find on the internet...only to go home and look the complete opposite.

Reina made sure that I knew what she was doing every step of the way so that I wouldn't be blindsided about any part of the process. I look forward to coming back and seeing her again the future! Thank you, Reina and harueh! ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text: I have been coming here for several years ever since Covid (when my hair grew long) and canâ€™t say enough about this salon!  Since then I have gotten my hair permed and down permed on the side on the regular. I work with Sang who is in charge of  styling my hair and who is also the owner of the salon. He is a master at his craft, especially Asian hair. Sang is incredibly knowledgeable and will recommend his expertise and advice, but also listen to what you want and give you advice based on that. He will also explain to you how to maintain and style your hair post-cut if you ask him for details. I have also gotten my hair worked on a few times by Jenny who is also excellent. One of the best traits of this salon is its consistency, every time I get a cut and perm here the results are always consistent and of high quality and I am always happy with the result. Sang is always in demand so if you want to get on his calendar make sure you call weeks or months in advance. The results will be worth it though. Highly recommend, and wouldnâ€™t trust anyone else with my hair! Thanks Harueh!

originalText.text: Hands down best hair cuts and stylist (Sang, the owner) ever! Have been going there for nearly 10 years would never go anywhere else. Very precise haircut which uses actual scissors (vs just buzzer!). I always give Sang free reign to decide on my style at each cut and he always makes a point of cutting it in a way that I can style it in a variety of ways, with or without product. Genius. Oh and super clean!

originalText.text: I've been coming here for more than three years now, and I cannot speak highly enough about it. My hair stylist, Jackie, is amazing -- she's skilled and knowledgeable, and she really just makes my day every time I see her. She gives great advice on how to cut + style your hair to fit your profile and consistently provides the best cuts.
